testimonials.name: Thembela Selani
testimonials.message: Zukisa is a smart student with a bright future. He always has a smile on his face and is a pleasure to work with. I look forward to seeing what he will achieve in the future and highly recommend him.

testimonials.name: Joel Mukanya
testimonials.message: As a fellow lecturer, I think Zukisa has a friendly and caring personality. He loves participating when he knows the answer. He is a hardworking individual who always shows determination to learn and to help others.

testimonials.name: Vuyile Magwaza
testimonials.message: Zukisa Maza is a hardworking person with perseverance, always eager to learn or work, and he is quite friendly.

testimonials.name: Asanda Radebe
testimonials.message: As a fellow student, I think Zukisa has a friendly and caring personality. He loves participating when he knows the answer. He is a hardworking individual who always shows determination to learn and to help others.

testimonials.name: Nkosinathi Siyeni
testimonials.message: Zukisa is a hard worker and a determined person in general. Additionally, he is a person who loves a challenge.

testimonials.name: Candice Amon
testimonials.message: As a fellow Manager, I think Zukisa has a friendly and caring personality. He loves participating when he knows the answer. He is a hardworking individual who always shows determination to learn and to help others.

basics.name: Zukisa Maza
basics.label: Aspiring Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: Hello! I'm Eric Zukisa Maza, I'm a keen learner and believe in an interdisciplinary approach to understanding the world. I am an ordinary person who has been blessed with extraordinary experiences. I'm a Xhosa guy who once studied Computer Science at the University of Western Cape, but not that long due to finances. Now I'm a good FullStack DEV at Life_Choices.

work.summary:
Currently enrolled in a 6 months Coding course. Skills offered:
- Learning modern web languages
- Chance to develop future orientated skills (emerging opportunities)
- Gain Confidence
- Gain confidence in being able to assess problems and design solutions.
- Team Work
- Learn how to work cohesively in a team and get practice with the tools used in the professional industry.
- Marketable Skills
- Relevant technical skills for the 21st century.
- Problem Solving
- Learn critical and abstract thinking to address relevant issues.
- Social Awareness
- Use web skills as a means for social impact.
Shop Assistant. Assisted with the daily operations around the shop, namely stock-taking, pricing and assisting customers with their needs.
Assisted the driver with deliveries & collections. Assisted with administration work (paperwork). Data capturing for the collections in and out of the warehouse.

skills.summary:
Was enrolled in a 3 months Coding course. Skills offered:
- Learning modern Data Science
- Chance to develop future orientated skills (Managing Data)
- Gain Confidence
- Gain confidence in being able to assess problems and design solutions.
- Team Work.
Data Wrangling and how to manage data using data manipulation and Jupyter notebook.

Website development and Application and figma design.
 Ever since writing my first program in Python and 
 manipulating it to produce a desired output, I have been obsessed 
 with the idea of using software to solve practical problems.
